typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameterDateHeureDemarrage as timestamp (currentUTC('GMT'))
}
source(output(
		DateHeure as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (SELECT @variables('DateHeureDemarrage') AS DateHeure),
	format: 'query') ~> sourceDatesEtHeures
sourceDatesEtHeures sink(input(
		DateHeure as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DateHeure
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDatesEtHeures
